narrative.title: Force L - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: French Mobile Column / Brigade deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Long-range desert raiding force and mobile column for extended cross-desert operations
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

special_rules: Mixed French colonial and European forces with British equipment
Camel reconnaissance for deep desert operations
